%modal.welcome.description.text: We want to create a real community with real teachers and real students. That's why you'll have to confirm a few, quick details to active your account.
%modal.finish.description.text: You can now immerse to new languages and cultures as a traveler/student or earn money by teaching a language.

%modal.recommend.teacher.title.text: wants you to be part of the biggest community of teachers and language schools.

%modal.recommend.teacher.invitation.mess: Being part of Waysily, you will create a reputation as teacher receiving recommendations from your students. Also, you can become visible to 6000+ students who travel to your country every year, and earn approximately
a week for doing what you do best:
%landing.puv.description: Waysily is a free community-based platform that helps you find local language tutors / schools in your area.
%landing.mission.description.text: To give everyone the perfect place to find teachers, schools, and people around the world to learn a language.
%landing.recommend.cntry.text: Which country would you like us to include on Waysily?
%landing.recommend.teacher.text.legacy: Do you know a teacher you would recommend to be part of Waysily?
%landing.recommend.teacher.text: Would you like to recommend a teacher?
%landing.recommend.school.text.legacy: Did you study at any school and you had a great experience there?
%landing.recommend.school.text: Let us know if you would like us to include a school
%landing.get_user.message.success.text: Thank you!, You’re all set. We’ll be in touch.
%landing.get_user.description.text: Get the list of new teachers and schools in your inbox.
%landing.get_user.help_text.text: Don't worry, we won't send you junk mail.
%landing.teacher.puv.v1: Be owner your time, do what you love and earn money to finance your dreams.
%landing.teacher.puv.v2: Make yourself visible and earn money while doing what you are most passionate about.
%landing.teacher.puv.v3: Build a reputation, become visible and earn money doing what you most passionate about.
%landing.teacher.puv.description.third_p: who travel to your country every year.
%landing.teacher.preview_container.title: When the students enter to Waysily map, they will see you like this:
%landing.teacher.explanation_section.des: a week on the Waysily map.
%landing.teacher.how_start.description.t: with information about your experience as a teacher or tutor. We will validate your information to make sure that your profile looks professional, if any information is necessary, we will contact you. Review time takes 3 to 4 days. After that period your profile will be available on
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.title.text: Why should I be in Waysily?
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.description: to learn a language by immersing themselves in the culture and customs of each country. If your classes offer a human connection, a dynamic  or an immersion in the local culture, you're in the right place.
Your profile is public on the platform, which will also have visibility to all students/travelers via email, Twitter and Facebook.
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.details.tit: So, why should I be in Waysily?:
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.details.fir: Build a reputation, and become visible globally.
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.details.sec: You will have the possibility to have more students every day.
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.details.fou: Free Marketing, and you will not depend on recommendations of friends and acquaintances.
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.details.fif: You will not have to spend money handing out business cards in public places. (e.g. cafes and hostels).
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.details.six: You set your prices and time.
%landing.teacher.why_waysily.details.sev: to stand out among the other teachers and receive more benefits.
%landing.teacher.badge_explanation.what_: It is a badge that you will see on all pages that refer to you as a teacher (profile, search results, etc.).
%landing.teacher.badge_explanation.benef: What benefits do I gain by obtaining the Waysily badge?
Teachers with the badge have frequent class reservations, priority support and exclusive access to new products and functions.
%landing.teacher.badge_explanation.get.t: How to get the Waysily badge?
%landing.teacher.badge_explanation.get.d: Teachers who meet the following requirements have the badge. The badge will appear at the bottom of your profile image:
%landing.teacher.badge_explanation.get.f: Teachers who provide a minimum of 10 classes per month through Waysily.
%landing.teacher.badge_explanation.get.s: Teachers provide classes that inspire enthusiastic reviews. At least 80% of your reviews need to be 5 stars.
%landing.teacher.badge_explanation.get.t: Teachers who respond to a class booking request quickly.
%landing.teacher.badge_explanation.get.f: Teachers who don't cancel confirmed reservations unless there are extenuating circumstances.
%landing.teacher.who.quote.text: The man who makes that the difficult things seem easy, is an educator.
%landing.teacher.who.description.text: Certified teachers or community tutors are welcome. You must have experience or enjoy teaching, if you meet this you can be part of this great community.
%landing.student.puv.description: When you learn a language with real people, you will learn more than just a language. You'll be exposed to a different culture and a new way of seeing the world.
%landing.student.how_work.step_1.descrip: All you have to do is enter your location in the search bar to find locals in your area with whom you can meet to learn their language and immerse yourself in new cultures.
%landing.student.how_work.step_2.descrip: Select a person with similar interests and hobbies to practice a language.
%landing.student.how_work.step_3.descrip: Find the best places to eat, drink and enjoy practicing a language.
%landing.student.how_work.step_4.descrip: Check the other person availability and choose a date and time to meet by sending an invitation.
%landing.student.how_work.step_5.descrip: Once you agree on a date, time and meeting point, all you have to do is enjoy the meeting. Be open to new cultures and you will see the world differently.
%landing.student.how_work.step_6.title.t: 6. At the end of your meeting, you can rate your experience
%landing.student.how_work.step_6.descrip: You can rate your experience on multiple criteria.
%landing.student.notify_block.descriptio: Be the first to know when it's ready.
%landing.student.input_comment.placehold: Do you want to know more about Waysily?. Any doubts?, write us.
%landing.student.notify_block.success_ms: You’re all set. We’ll be in touch.
%recover.password.not_match.text: Your new passwords did not match. Please try again.
%recover.password.success.text: Successful change!. Try signing in now.
%recover.password.link_expired.text: The link that we sent to your email already expired, it is necessary that you request a new one.
%recover.password.password_common.text: Your password isn’t strong enough. Try making it longer or adding symbols, like !, #, or %.
%profile.teacher.large_message.text.lega: So your profile would look when we finished validating your information
%profile.teacher.large_message.text: Your profile as a teacher is still in validation process
%create.teacher.welcome.title.text: Welcome!, The process takes approximately 10 minutes
%create.teacher.welcome.subtitle.text: What kind of teacher are you?
%create.teacher.welcome.type.hobby.descr: Native or near-native speaker that enjoys teaching informally. 18 years or older.
%create.teacher.welcome.type.professiona: Working Professional that has been trained in foreign language acquisition.
%create.teacher.welcome.help_text.descri: In your city, private teachers are earning approximately:
%create.teacher.basic_info.form.birthdat: Select your birth date to continue
%create.teacher.basic_info.form.about.in: e.g. I enjoy traveling around the world, meeting cultures and learning languages.
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.tit: Show the world who you are
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.des: Waysily wants to create real connections. Describe yourself helps your future students get to know you better. Share with them a little of you, likes, trips, or hobbies. Tell them what it would be like to have you as a teacher. Is there a particular phrase that defines your way of teaching?
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.nam: Only your first name will be displayed on your profile. When a student requests a reservation, the student will be able to see your first and last name. This is for your safety.
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.ema: We will not share your email address with other users.
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.pho: This information will not be shared with other users. We will only use it to contact you if necessary.
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.gen: This data is required, because there are students who prefer to receive classes of women and others of men.
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.bir: This field is required since some students prefer to receive classes of teachers older than them.
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.bor: It's important that students know whether or not you are native to the language you're teaching.
%create.teacher.basic_info.help_text.abo: Show the world who you are

Waysily wants to create real connections. Describe yourself helps your future students get to know you better. Share with them a little of you, likes, trips, or hobbies. Tell them what it would be like to have you as a teacher. Is there a particular phrase that defines your way of teaching?
%create.teacher.location.form.position.t: Drag the marker to change location.
%create.teacher.location.help_text.title: Let them find you faster
%create.teacher.location.help_text.descr: Your exact address will not be shared with anyone for safety. Position yourself on the map is an approximation to show students that you are near them.
%create.teacher.location.help_text.cntry: Your exact address will not be shared with anyone for safety. Position yourself on the map is an approximation to show students that you are near them.
%create.teacher.location.help_text.state: Your exact address will not be shared with anyone for safety. Position yourself on the map is an approximation to show students that you are near them.
Your exact address will not be shared with anyone for safety. Position yourself on the map is an approximation to show students that you are near them.
%create.teacher.location.help_text.zip_c: Your exact address will not be shared with anyone for safety. Position yourself on the map is an approximation to show students that you are near them.
%create.teacher.location.help_text.addre: Your address will not be shared with anyone, this field is simply to locate you on the map, but your exact position will not be known by any user.
%create.teacher.location.help_text.posit: You can drag the marker if the map is not showing the location you want to share. Click and hold the marker, and drag it to the location you want.
%create.teacher.lang.title.text: Step 3 -  What languages do you dominate?
%create.teacher.lang.help_text.descripti: Share all languages with which you are familiar, from the native language until the language you are learning in order to make known to your students in which other languages they could communicate with you.
%create.teacher.lang.help_text.native.de: Languages you have mastered since childhood.
%create.teacher.lang.help_text.teach.des: Add all the languages you have learned throughout your life and you are in the ability to teach.
%create.teacher.lang.help_text.learn.des: It's important that your students know which other languages you speak fluently or you're learning, as this would help better communication during the lessons.
%create.teacher.experience.title.text: Step 4 -  What is you experience as a teacher?
%create.teacher.experience.form.inline_h: Texto de ayuda explicando algo importante en esta sección.
%create.teacher.experience.help_text.tit: Experiences as a professional teacher or tutor
%create.teacher.experience.help_text.des: By sharing your experience as a teacher you show your trajectory through the years, this is very important as it helps to reassure to the student when choose a teacher.
%create.teacher.experience.help_text.typ: Native or near-native speaker that enjoys teaching informally. 18 years or older.
Working Professional that has been trained in foreign language acquisition.
%create.teacher.experience.help_text.tea: Specify the year in which you started the teaching adventure.
%create.teacher.experience.help_text.exp: Experiences as a professional teacher or tutor
By sharing your experience as a teacher you show your trajectory through the years, this is very important as it helps to reassure to the student when choose a teacher.
%create.teacher.education.form.inline_he: Texto de ayuda explicando algo importante en esta sección.
Texto de ayuda explicando algo importante en esta sección.
%create.teacher.education.help_text.desc: Your time and money invested learning a language is highly valued by all students. Tell them more about your studies.
%create.teacher.education.help_text.educ: University or Higher Education Degree in Education or Teaching
Share your professional degrees with students. (e.g. Bachelor's, Master's or Doctoral Degree in Education).
%create.teacher.education.help_text.cert: Share your certifications with students. (e.g. TESOL, TEFL, Foreign Language Teaching Certification).
%create.teacher.education.validation.mes: You need to share a study (professional degree or certificate)
e.g. My classes are maximum 1 hour 30 minutes, we look for a different place each class (cafe, museum, park, etc.)
%create.teacher.method.form.imm.type.oth: e.g. We will take classes every Friday at Velvet Café surrounded by locals.
%create.teacher.method.help_text.title.t: Your teaching style makes the difference
%create.teacher.method.help_text.descrip: 90% of travelers are seeking to immerse themselves in new cultures in order to speed up their language learning. Mixing this with a tutor who guides them all the way, travelers get unique experiences, and learning a language quickly.
%create.teacher.method.help_text.methodo: This field is required. This will be an excellent guide since according to the method you use, students will feel more identified and related with your methodology. Describe in detail what teaching method you use (e.g. books and supporting material, conversations with local people, flashcards, etc.).
%create.teacher.method.help_text.imm.des: Describe if your classes offer some kind of 'immersion in the language'. Being in direct contact with local people is a big factor to learn a language faster. (e.g. Exit every third class to the central park to talk with local people or each Friday class will be in a cafe to share with locals, etc.).
%create.teacher.method.validation.messag: If you offer immersion, please specify your type of immersion
%create.teacher.price.help_text.title.te: Set the price to your work
%create.teacher.price.help_text.descript: Set the price to your teaching time (in dollars). On average a teacher who teaches to travelers in your country is earning $ 20 / hour. It all depends on your experience and the reputation you build in Waysily.
%create.teacher.price.help_text.private_: These are the classes in which you focus 100% on one student per class. (1 to 1).
%create.teacher.price.help_text.group_cl: These are the classes in which you focus on several students per class. Remember, the price that you assign will be per person. Calculate maximum 3 people per group.
%create.teacher.price.validation.message: Is Required to choose a type of Classes
%create.teacher.photo.form.avatar.descri: Make sure your photo satisfies the following criteria:
%create.teacher.photo.form.avatar.criter: Is not too close or too far away.
Shows your eyes and face clearly.
Is clear and has good lighting.
%create.teacher.photo.user.help_text.des: Clear front photos are an important way for teachers and students to get to know each other. Load a photo that clearly shows your face.
Your photo is very important since it gives the student confidence, be sure to read the criteria. We'll validate your photo, if it doesn't follow the criteria, your profile will not be public.
%create.teacher.photo.help_text.avatar.u: We will validate your photograph so that you are sure that it satisfies the minimum criteria. This will help you get students quickly.
%create.teacher.finish.description.text: We'll check your information and we'll notify you when you are already visible on the map of Waysily.
%profile.school.volunteering.types.title: Volunteering options

%tooltip.modal_born.cntry_birth.text: It's important to know your country birth and identify your native language.
%tooltip.modal_born.city_birth.text: It's important to know your city birth and identify your native language.
%tooltip.modal_basic_info.phone_number.t: We'll just share it when you have a confirmed reservation with a teacher
%tooltip.modal_basic_info.gender.text: This field is required since we can identify you better.
%tooltip.modal_basic_info.about.text: Waysily is based on creating real connections. We want other users to know a little more about you.
